name: Gouda Balls
author: KAREN HOWITT
summary: Easy, unusual treat that everyone will love! Roll in a favorite spice like ground cumin, paprika, or chili powder. Serve immediately with sliced French bread, crackers, or apple wedges.
ingredients: 2 (7 ounce) balls Gouda cheese, wax removed
directions: In a bowl, mix the sour cream, butter, and flour
Divide into two equal portions, cover, and refrigerate 2 hours
Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C)
Roll out the dough portions on a flat surface
Place a gouda ball in the center of each portion, and wrap
Roll wrapped balls in the cumin
Bake 20 minutes in the preheated oven, until lightly browned
